name: 勒妮·斯托克
introduction: Most recently, Renee appeared in Maestro with Bradley Cooper and Carey Mulligan. She recurred as Judge Whitney in the Law & Order season finale and guest starred opposite Dylan McDermott in the FBI: Most Wanted season finale. She will be seen this fall in Colin Farrell's highly anticipated HBO series, The Penguin. Renée also worked on Netflix' Ripley and was thrilled to work opposite Andrew Scott and have Steven Zaillian's direction. Early in life, Renee was a classically trained ballet dancer and performed in the original cast of Jerome Robbins' Broadway. Before moving her acting career to television and film, she performed in many stage productions regionally, nationally, and internationally.
